TEXT.English: [H1]U-Kix-Chan[\H1][NEWLINE][BOLD]King of the Palenque[\BOLD][NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Background:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][TAB]U-Kix-Chan is the founder of the B'aakal Dynasty at Palenque, what would become a Maya kingdom.
TEXT.French: [H1]U-Kix-Chan[\H1][NEWLINE][BOLD]King of the Palenque[\BOLD][NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Background:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][TAB]U-Kix-Chan is the founder of the B'aakal Dynasty at Palenque, what would become a Maya kingdom.
TEXT.German: [H1]U-Kix-Chan[\H1][NEWLINE][BOLD]King of the Palenque[\BOLD][NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Background:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][TAB]U-Kix-Chan is the founder of the B'aakal Dynasty at Palenque, what would become a Maya kingdom.
TEXT.Italian: [H1]U-Kix-Chan[\H1][NEWLINE][BOLD]King of the Palenque[\BOLD][NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Background:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][TAB]U-Kix-Chan is the founder of the B'aakal Dynasty at Palenque, what would become a Maya kingdom.
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]U-Kix-Chan[\H1][NEWLINE][BOLD]King of the Palenque[\BOLD][NEWLINE][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Background:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][TAB]U-Kix-Chan is the founder of the B'aakal Dynasty at Palenque, what would become a Maya kingdom.

TEXT.English: Welcome, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people. May our friendship last longer than the stones.
TEXT.French: Bienvenue, [CT_NAME] ! Je suis [OUR_NAME] du peuple olmèque. Puisse notre amitié durer plus longtemps que les pierres.
TEXT.German: Welcome, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people. May our friendship last longer than the stones.
TEXT.Italian: Welcome, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people. May our friendship last longer than the stones.
TEXT.Spanish: Welcome, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people. May our friendship last longer than the stones.
